channel.title: Fixing trade dupe in deltascape
channel.description:
Does anyone know how to fix the trade dupe? I have been using Google, Runelocus, and the search bar. Please don't tell me to "fix it yourself. Were not going to spoon feed you." This is the help section... not the figure it out yourself section.
Thank you,
SchecterPK

well all i am doing is asking for a code, and every1 just tells me to fix it my self, this is the help thread god damit, and no1 is helping me.

item.title: Fixing trade dupe in deltascape
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

[code]try and see if this works for you

tradeConfirmed = false;
tradeConfirmed2 = false;
offeredItems.clear();
inTrade = false;
trade_reqId = 0;[/code]It should look like this:

[code] public void declineTrade(boolean tellOther) {
closeInterface();
canOffer = true;
tradeConfirmed = false;
tradeConfirmed2 = false;
offeredItems.clear();
inTrade = false;
trade_reqId = 0;
client other = getClient(trade_reqId);
if (tellOther && validClient(trade_reqId)) {
//other.sM(“Other player has declined the trade.”);
other.declineTrade(false);
}

    for (GameItem item : offeredItems) {
        if (item.amount < 1)
            continue;
        if (item.stackable) {
            addItem(item.id, item.amount);
        } else {
            for (int i = 0; i < item.amount; i++) {
                addItem(item.id, 1);
            }
        }
    }

}[/code]Check your logout method for:

if(inTrade) { declinetrade(true); }If its there, delete it.

Read full topic
